title: Has anyone here ever made a homemade rail gun?
body:
I was with my thot patrol up in the mountains for a vacation and we realized we aint got shit if some bear decides to fuck with us

so i was like "no prob i'll make a rail gun"

but i didn't have batteries and pvc pipes and shit

so my question is, has anyone here ever made a rail gun and how was the result?

replies.body:
Unsure if serious..

You cannot make a railgun from any components that can be easily purchased, and you definitely cannot assemble or operate it without knowing what the fuck you are doing - ie being a trained engineer with rather specialized talents.

If your goal is to kill yourself and anyone else nearby in an imaginative and stupid way, this is why Tannerite exists.
I'm going to college for engineering so I can make a railgun
You're better off sharpening a stick if you'd just be using batteries.
